net.sf.sprockets.preference

Class Prefs

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.sprockets.preference.Prefs

  • public class Prefs
extends Object
    Utility methods for working with SharedPreferences and keys used within the library.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String APP_VERSION_CODE 
      static String APP_VERSION_NAME 
      static String RATED
      True if the navigation drawer 'Rate' option has been clicked.
      static String SPROCKETS
      Library preferences name.
